Reviews.Title: needed this for an extra camera
Reviews.Author: RWL
Reviews.Content: Needed this license for an extra camera I added to my 4 license camera I already had. It added the other camera w/o any problems.

ProductInfo.Features:
View and record live video from multiple cameras simultaneously
Remote access via a Web browser or Windows client; multiple search functions for recorded events
Enables control of PTZ and dome cameras
Alarm alert functions, no recording limitation in software
Multilingual support for English, French, Italian, German and Spanish
ProductInfo.Name: Axis 0202034 Camera Station 1 License Add On
